CREATE TABLE users ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL, user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, phone VARCHAR(20), role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'USER', created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
CONSTRAINT `PRIMARY` PRIMARY KEY (id) )
